scripts.vendor:copy: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force assets/vendor/xlsx | Out-Null; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force assets/vendor/jspdf | Out-Null; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force assets/vendor/autotable | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Path node_modules/xlsx/dist/xlsx.full.min.js -Destination assets/vendor/xlsx/ -Force; Copy-Item -Path node_modules/jspdf/dist/jspdf.umd.min.js -Destination assets/vendor/jspdf/ -Force; Copy-Item -Path node_modules/jspdf-autotable/dist/jspdf.plugin.autotable.min.js -Destination assets/vendor/autotable/ -Force;"
